function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spatial distribution of hospitals and number of beds impact COVID-19 spread.","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission and overwhelmed healthcare facilities.","Mitigation":"Strategic allocation of hospitals and beds based on population density and infection rates.","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis and modeling, data-driven resource allocation.","People":"General population, healthcare workers, government officials.","Owner":"Government, public health agencies, urban planners."}]}
